Configuring Permissions¶

Before you start using PetBlocks on your server, you should also configure the permissions for your players.

Admin¶

These are the recommend permissions for administrators or moderators.

Description

Permission

Allows to use the /petblocks administration command

petblocks.admin.command.pets

Allows to use the /petblockreload command

petblocks.admin.command.reload

Users¶

Description

Permission

Allows to access the gui of of petblocks

petblocks.gui

Allows to use the /petblock command

petblocks.command.use

Allows to use the /petblock rename command

petblocks.command.rename

Allows to use the /petblock toggle command

petblocks.command.toggle

Allows to use the /petblock call command

petblocks.command.call

Permissionlist¶

Note

Please note that these are all default permissions in PetBlocks which cannot be changed.

Note

Locking certain GUI items with even more custom permissions can be found on this page.

Description

Permission

Allows to use the /petblocks administration command

petblocks.admin.command.pets

Allows to use the /petblockreload command

petblocks.admin.command.reload

Allows to access the gui of of petblocks

petblocks.gui

Allows to use the /petblock command

petblocks.command.use

Allows to use the /petblock rename command

petblocks.command.rename

Allows to use the /petblock toggle command

petblocks.command.toggle

Allows to use the /petblock call command

petblocks.command.call

Allows to use the /petblock skin command

petblocks.command.customhead
